name: foundation
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: foundation
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an occasion when an organization, state, etc. is established

example.eg: the foundation of a new state

trans_examp.trans_en: an organization that has been created in order to provide money for a particular group of people in need of help or for a particular type of study
the first year of infant school, previously known as reception

example.egtrans: 幼儿学校小班课堂／教师

example.eg: Her youngest child starts (in) foundation in September.
example.egtrans: 她最小的孩子9月份上幼儿学校小班。

dsense.name: foundation
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: the structures below the surface of the ground that support a building

example.eg: The foundations will have to be reinforced to prevent the house from sinking further into the ground.
example.egtrans: 地基必须进行加固以防房屋继续下陷。

dsense.name: foundation
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: These allegations are completely without foundation.
example.egtrans: 这些指控完全没有根据。

dsense.name: foundation
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a type of make-up that is spread over the skin of the face, usually before other make-up is put on, giving it a better and more even colour and hiding unwanted marks
